}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== The FCC ID may be NI3-IS-30V16
===Features=== *Can boost signal throughput up to 54Mbps using SuperG Mode *Built-in 128-bit WPA encryption for security *200mW high output power
==See also== :;[[EnGenius]] • [[Senao]] *[[EnGenius EL-2511MP+]] *[[EnGenius EL-2611CB3+ Deluxe]] • Indoor Wireless Access Point Bridge (Long-Range 200mW) *[[EnGenius EL-2611CB5+]] • Outdoor Wireless Access Point Bridge (Long-Range 200mW) *[[EnGenius EL-2611CB5+ Ext]] • Outdoor Wireless Access Point Bridge (Long-Range 200mW) *[[EnGenius EL-3054CB3+ Deluxe]] • Indoor Wireless Access Point Bridge WDS (Long-Range 200mW) *[[EnGenius EL-3054MP+ Frisbee]] • *[[EnGenius EL-3054MP Aries2(f)]] • *[[EnGenius EL-3054MP+ Aries2]] • Wireless Mini-PCI Card (802.11b/g 54Mbps Long-Range) *[[EnGenius EL-5354MP+ Aries2]] • Wireless Mini-PCI Card (802.11a/b/g 54Mbps Long-Range) *[[EnGenius EL-5354MP Aries2(f)]] •
*[[Senao NL-3054CB PLUS Aries2]] • NI3-30V214 • PCMCIA (32-bit) • AR5212 (bg) *[[Senao NL-5354CB PLUS Aries2]] • NI3-AT53V214 • PCMCIA (32-bit) • AR5212 (abg) *[[Senao NL-3054MP PLUS]] • NI3-AT30V215 ?? • Mini PCI • ISL3880 (bg) *[[Senao NL-3054MP PLUS Aries2]] • NI3-AT30V216 • Mini PCI • AR5212 (bg) *[[Senao NL-5354MP+ Aries2]] • NI3-AT53V216 • Mini PCI • [[Atheros]] AR5212 (abg) *[[Senao NL-3054UB5]] • USB 2.0 • [[Intersil]] ISL3880/ISL3686A (bg)
*[[Senao SL-3054CB ARIES]] • NI3-AT30V114 • PCMCIA (32-bit) • AR5212 (bg) *[[Senao SL-5354CB ARIES]] • NI3-AT53V114 • PCMCIA (32-bit) • AR5212 (abg) *[[Senao SL-3054CB PLUS]] • NI3-IS-30V14 • PCMCIA (32-bit) • ISL3880 (bg) *[[Senao SL-3054PCI Aries]] • NI3-AT30V17 • PCI • AR5212 (bg) *[[Senao SL-5354MP Aries]] • Mini PCI • [[Atheros]] AR5212 (abg)
